title: Scikit-Learn Classifier Comparison
description: In this lab, we will compare several classifiers in Scikit-Learn on synthetic datasets. The purpose of this lab is to illustrate the nature of decision boundaries of different classifiers. We will preprocess the datasets, split them into training and test parts, and plot the datasets. We will then iterate over classifiers, fit the classifiers on the training data, plot the decision boundaries, and plot the testing data. Finally, we will display the classification accuracy on the test set.

meta.title: Comparing Classifiers in Scikit-Learn | Machine Learning Tutorials
meta.description: Explore different classification algorithms and their decision boundaries on synthetic datasets using Scikit-Learn in this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Scikit-Learn, Machine Learning, Classification, Decision Boundaries, Synthetic Datasets

i18n.title: Scikit - 学习分类器比较
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将在合成数据集上比较Scikit - 学习中的几种分类器。本实验的目的是说明不同分类器决策边界的性质。我们将对数据集进行预处理，将它们拆分为训练集和测试集，并绘制数据集。然后，我们将遍历分类器，在训练数据上拟合分类器，绘制决策边界，并绘制测试数据。最后，我们将展示测试集上的分类准确率。

meta.title: 比较Scikit - 学习中的分类器 | 机器学习教程
meta.description: 在这个全面的编程教程中，使用Scikit - 学习探索合成数据集上的不同分类算法及其决策边界。
meta.keywords: Scikit - 学习, 机器学习, 分类, 决策边界, 合成数据集
